name: TweetDeck Dark + Orange
description:
A dark/orange theme for TweetDeck inspired by Talon for Twitter (http://klinkerapps.com/). Popups are mostly unaffected.
Remember to turn on the dark TweetDeck theme in the settings!

user.name: Hademar
user.about: Dutch IT student who likes videogames and TV series. Wants to get involved in game development some day. I made a style in my free time and might make more.
